steps.name: Given I have created an instance of the CustomResourceDefinition TestResource
But it is represented in an opaque format using the SerializedEntandoResource class
And I will update its status phase to 'SUCCESSFUL' within 300 milliseconds
When I wait for the SerializedEntandoResource deployment to be completed
Then the latest version of the resource is available and its phase is 'SUCCESSFUL'

labels.value: As a controller developer, I would like perform common operations on the relevant Kubernetes resources through a simple interface to reduce the learning curve
